name: Toader (itch)
description: Toader is a vertical platformer with arcade-like gameplay. It features a single level where objects progressively move faster after each time you reach the end goal. The game also features a top 50 High Score list read from an online database. Online participation is completely optional and your own personal High Scores will be tracked instead. Toader has both keyboard or gamepad support with robust in-game key re-mapping.
